pattern.message1: The password must contain at least 1 lowercase alphabetical character.
pattern.message2: The password must contain at least 1 uppercase alphabetical character.

pattern.message4: The password must contain at least one special character (!, @, #, $, %, ^, &).
pattern.message5: The password must be eight characters or longer.
